review: Perfect for the bedroom TV but I miss the voice remote you get with the console version.
author: NWAnn

review: I like it, it's a little slow but it does the job, the only reason that it gets 4 stars is because with some applications says cache full, and then I have to go to manage applications and clean the cache, besides that It's pretty good, also the android app is more or less functional but it helps to typeAlso when I first connected it to the television's USB port the fire stick displayed a message saying that it didn't had enough power to work, then I connected it to the wall plug and still displayed the same message but it let me continue anyway.
author: Alfredo De la rosa

review: Bought two of these for our house.  Great little devices well worth the investment.  Cable-free baby!
author: UltimateCap

review: streams a plethora of different kinds smoothly and clearly.  very easy to setup and very user friendly.

review: I really enjoy the extra media

review: keeps downloading over and over again , then says error try again. I would not recommend this fire stick.
